ygData.subject: Re: Destructor catchs on to kit kat
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She heard him and knew his words were true.  She responded, Well, Destructor, you have been made my Strategic Officer, I shall let you handle this then.

::KitKat::

She heard him and knew his words were true.  She responded,"Well, 
Destructor, you have been made my Strategic Officer, I shall let you 
handle this then.  But yes, you are correct. You think as a pack 
memeber. I know that you shall do the right thing for the pack. 
Notify me as things happen." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>   Destructor heard this from Kit Kat.."What is your plan for the 
trainers. If 
> we side with the trainers we will never win the maximals over as 
allies. 
> Think about this."
